captions.text:
Why can't we do a conversation about how hot
Hermoine is?

Because she's a fictional character.
So

There's also the more pressing matter of how
criminally underage she is.

But she's played by Emma Watson, who is not
underage and totally hot.

She was underage when she played Hermoine!
Table read.

Table read.
Gonna do a table read.

Table read.
Are you waiting for me to say something?

Well, you do have the first line in the script.
Oh, yeah. My bad. Okay. Hey, you know what

I was thinking the other day when I was watching
Harry Potter?

You name one actress who's hotter than Emma
Stone.

Cut. Cut.
What?

It's Emma Watson not Emma Stone. You dumbass.
As usual, you messed up your line.

No. I didn't. He might have, but I didn't.
Well, I guess it's probably hard to remember

your lines when you don't bother to learn
them in the first place.

I learn them. I do. I just forget them.
Alright. Do we need to take five so you can

go learn your lines?
No, we do not need to take five! I got this.

A hundred bucks says you don't got this.
You are not helping, alright. And you forgot

to put your hood on so they'll think you've
got headphones on.

And you, I could replace you with any number
of guys around here that look like you, alright?

Are you threatening me? Like, do you want
me to call my agent?

Dude, Dad is not your agent, no matter how
many times you say it. He's just a senile

old man who doesn't know who the hell you
are.

It's not my fault he can't remember who I
am.

No, it's actually entirely your fault. You
were the one holding the ladder.

Buddy, what are you doing?
I don't know how you can even complain about

me on a set that has him on it.
He's just as much a part of this family as

you are, alright? He deserves to be a part
of this.

Can you at least give him a job where he doesn't
screw up every take. I mean, did he even graduate

from microphone school?
There's no such thing as microphone school.

In this case, there's not even any such thing
as microphone.

That is not a microphone, it's a golf club.
By the looks of it, it's a 3-wood.

Buddy, come on! What are you doing?!
I told you he was incompetent.

He's not incompetent, alright, you just have
to learn how to work with somebody slower

than you. I sure did.
Wait, guys. How are we even recording audio

right now?
That's it. I'll be in my trailer.

You mean the Corolla?
Yes.

I guess we're taking five.
Nah, don't worry about it. I'll just do both

parts.
How will that work?

I'll change shirts in between and just split
screen it down the middle. Who's gonna know?

title: Behind The Scenes - Conversations With Myself About Movies

comments.text:
Jeremy and his PARTNER are BOTH in this video. Listen closely at the 3:16 
mark when the (off-camera) partner says "YES" in response to "You mean the 
Corolla?". It's definitely not Jeremy's voice. I love how they slipped this 
easter egg into the behind the scenes, and reveal that there are two people 
that make these conversations vids. Kudos to the two of you.﻿

comments.author: JohannaMueller57

comments.text:
+JohannaMueller57 I explained what number 2 was. You either lack 
comprehension or are just ignorant.

Get over yourself, I never lectured anyone on vocabulary and I don't know 
what garbage you're spilling about Happy Potter, never read it, don't care 
to.

You also keep using fallacious logic "Don't lecture someone on vocabulary 
when you lack comprehension." This doesn't even make sense, vocabulary and 
comprehension are different things, that's like saying "Don't lecture 
someone on cars when you don't know about bikes." It's just silly.

No doubt you'll come up with some inane attempted insult again over a 
subject that really shouldn't even matter but you just must find reason to 
feel superior and correct. Maybe you should go see a therapist about your 
issues or something.

 I won't waste any more time on someone who ignores things said to them to 
suit their own hateful attitude, reply with more garbage if you want, I 
have nothing more to say to you.

Good luck with your arrogant narcissism. Have fun. ^^

on vocabulary. please don't have a good day, get run over by a bus or 
something.
comments.author: JohannaMueller57

comments.text:
+JohannaMueller57 Apparently you are the one who is stupid. Because I 
already replied to you saying that.

I said it is one person and the second point I made is that 4 people is 
called quadruplets, not twins.

I properly replied to what you said, apparently YOU however, are too 
"stoopid" to understand my reply.

What you said was redundant, you do know what that means right? Because I 
did not say that twins could not play quadruplets, I simply said because 
there are 4 that would be quadruplets, because the OP did not state that he 
thought it was twins playing 4 roles, I was covering extra bases due to 
insufficient content in his comment to be sure of what he intended.

The first one I said covered the fact there is only one, the second part 
covered in case he was not a natural English speaker and thought they were 
all individuals. So I was pointing out the term for 4 was quadruplets, 
simply as a means to inform.

Now if you are too stupid to understand this last reply or you can't pull 
your head out of your insulting moron rage long enough to comprehend it, 
then we have nothing more to say and you can go on your merry ignorant way 
of insulting strangers to feel good about yourself like a pathetic little 
weak minded troll.

Have a good day. ^^
